text: The Cadillac GT4 is a compact luxury Crossover SUV made by Cadillac since 2023. == History and Features == The Cadillac GT4 was first revealed in May 2023.https://www.motor1.com/news/669519/cadillac-gt4-official-debut-china/ and launched in 2023 it is produced by SAIC-GM a joint venture between SAIC Motor and General Motors its also the first Cadillac model made mainly for China the car has a 1.5 liter turbo and 2.0 liter turbo gasoline engines with a 9-speed automatic transmission both versions of the GT4 operate a hybrid system. == Markets == The Cadillac GT4 is the first Cadillac car made mainly for the Chinese market and is sold only there. == References == GT4 Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Cadillac GT4
